nodes.text: The Bounty Post was the only permanent structure in the Souk. It allowed individuals to post or look for bounties. Every user was given a unique identification number, and the Bounty Post took a finder's fee off of paid bounty.

It allowed people who were placing bounties to avoid working directly with the hunter. It was also fully networked with other bounty posts in other shadowports across the galaxy. This allowed it to have a wide range of jobs and include detailed data such as maps, holos or specific biological information.
